text.title: Top 10 Video Games That Will Blow Your Mind in 2025
text.p: well look who's back welcome to watch
Mojo and today we're counting down our
picks for the games set to release this
year that have every chance of becoming
huge successes and beloved in the eyes
of Gamers everywhere we're including
games that at the time of writing are
listed for release in 2025 and praying
they stay there Sam the man in the
dark about
everything number 10 a vow you must be
our Imperial
Envoy better late than never I say while
the visuals are a tad On The Rough Side
this is Obsidian we're talking about you
leave these guys to cook up a story and
chances are it'll come out an absolute
treat combining the setting of the
pillars of Eternity franchise with Rich
customization FPS fantasy battles and
branching dialogue that seems to be
chasing the tail coats of balers Gate 3
which is never a bad thing the more we
see of this game the more we're
convinced it's going to leave a hell of
a stamp on the genre upon arrival what
are you going to do with
it number nine split fiction we sure
cause a lot of
explosions we've been waiting with
baited breath for a followup to the
likes of it takes two the couch Co-op
Master Class brought To Us by Resident
madlad Joseph Ferris and given the
preview so far it looks like he's given
us a similar setup with double the
craziness trapped in a simulation as a
pair of aspiring authors players will
will be constantly switching between
fantasy and sci-fi settings along with a
multitude of mechanics to master given
how much their previous work was able to
experiment with style and create a
seamless experience we're hoping this
spiritual successor follows in its
footsteps what are you doing in my story
something bad is going on here number
eight Monster Hunter Wilds incredible
I've never heard of a katno herd this
big before world and Rise did a
tremendous job at breathing fresh life
into what has since become one of
capcom's flagship franchises now Wild's
look set to not only expand the scope of
its biomes but also the immensity of the
beasts themselves with the introduction
of wounding the hooks Slinger as well as
mounts for both land and Sky taking down
behemoths is likely going to be as
challenging and as satisfying as it gets
whether you're summoning NPCs or you've
got your hunting party on lock this game
is going to have Legions diving into its
lands with no desire to leave so Captain
what's your team been getting up to
number seven Golden Ring night rain
Seekers of
redemption you were chosen on the one
hand there's a little bit of trepidation
Rippling about in regards to this latest
outing from the lands between after all
it's a multiplayer Rogue light and isn't
being directed by Miyazaki on the other
hand it's a new direction that has every
chance of succeeding as long as the
fundamentals are solid and the flow of
combat is up to that same Elden ring
standard were all too eager to dive in
again also the fact that this is somehow
combining characters and bosses from
Dark Souls 3 can't be ignored band
together and prepare to
CL number six Metroid Prime 4
Beyond at long last the promised Time
Has Come fans of samus's exploits have
been waiting for what seems like eons
for the legendary Bounty Hunter to make
her grand return via this most
anticipated forol and now it is upon us
alongside ushering in the successor to
the Nintendo switch Beyond is taking the
time honored mechanics of morph ball
puzzles and fluid FPS combat and giving
them the mother of all graphical updates
as well as a new Nemesis for Samus to
test her medal against given the
recently released remaster of the first
Prime game we know how well Metroid
style of gameplay holds up now we just
have to wait and see what else Beyond
has up its sleeve to make the Decades of
waiting feel truly earned
[Music]
number five Clare obscure Expedition 33
one
stroke and everyone of that age vanishes
into nothingness this thing came out of
nowhere and has refused to leave our
minds since seemly combining the
stylings of a classic turn-based RPG
with visuals pulled right out of a
Renaissance painting sprinkled in with a
star studded cast Expedition 33 has
every chance to become one of the year's
Front Runners the Le mission to stop the
god-like paintress from destroying
Humanity one year at a time has us very
much intrigued as is the fact we now
have the likes of Andy Circus Ben star
and Charlie freaking Cox in the same
game though if there's one aspect we
can't wait to experience for ourselves
it's how it plays with the trimmings and
trappings of its turn-based framework
and puts its own spin on it may
everything be decided before their very
eyes Between the Bars of that Prison
number four death stranding two on the
beach the people here are all spread out
cut off from one another we want you to
help us bring the world together you
wanted unfiltered Kojima you've got it
the original death stranding was beyond
polarizing and now it seems one of video
game most beloved otter is doubling down
on his particular brand of Storytelling
because that's just how he rolls looking
for Grand conversations about how tar is
a potential primordial soup for life in
the mood to see Troy Baker fight against
a samurai Mecca hijacked by a psychic
newborn it's all here while there's no
guarantee that this sequel will be for
you we can confidently say it will be
like no other game you experienced this
year don't ever change
coima hey brother did you miss me number
three Doom the Dark
[Music]
Ages how does one go about following up
the explosion of testosterone and
bullets that was doing Doom Eternal a
game where one man literally shoots his
way through hell on Earth apparently you
set it in the Medieval ages and give the
Dooms Slayer a chainsaw shield and a fur
Pelt oh and his own dragon this honestly
looks like the most metal game we've
seen in years and that's even comparing
it to the grandio slaughterhouse that
were its prequels if they can make every
level match the raw intensity of its
reveal trailer and not get too bogged
down in any unnecessary lore then this
has every potential to become the
franchise's Pinnacle
number two Grand Theft Auto 6
luia do you know why you're here bad
luck I guess granted as history can
attest to there's every chance that we
won't be seeing this thing until the
next Century but until set otherwise
2025 looks set to be the year of GTA 6's
colossally overdue arrival a game that
promises to consume the medium like few
could ever hope to a sprawling cityscape
filled with activity side missions and
satire a story of thievery Ella a pair
of Bonnie and Clydes protagonists and
that's just scratching the surface GTA
games are all about go big or go home
and few have the kind of hype as this
sixth Mainline entry if they truly can
find a way to raise the bar and outdo
GTA 5 on a technical and narrative level
then we can confidently say without
hyperbole that this game won't just be
one that defines the year but
potentially the next several

trust before we continue be sure to

the locations Lush the story The

back jyn's story may have concluded but
we have everlasting faith in sucker
Punch's capacity as developers to rope
